column4: If I specified a separate partition for the OS and a separate partition for my home directory, how do I go about keeping my /home when I reinstall Ubuntu?
Never doe it myself, but I'd say just make a symlink to the /home partition. Give me a moment and I'll find you something.
Thanks I'll check that link out :D
:) I've been meaning to do it but too lazy. When I do get around to it, that's what I'm going to use. ;)
